title.rendered: Regent College London takes part in weekly #clapforcarers

content.rendered: During such tough and draining times, we are incredibly happy to see the positivity and light that the nation is bringing. It’s important to stick together and do what we can to help those on the frontline. The staff at Regent College London took part in the weekly #clapforcarers to show our continued support for our brilliant NHS key workers. We cannot thank them enough for risking their lives to save ours. To everyone working to keeping the country going, we thank you!

excerpt.rendered: It’s important to stick together and do what we can to help those on the frontline. The staff at Regent College London took part in the weekly #clapforcarers to show our continued support for our brilliant NHS key workers.
